name: Carbon Black Defense
description: This app integrates with an instance of Carbon Black defense to run investigative actions

siem_connector_id.description: SIEM Connector ID (only used for 'get notifications')

actions.description: List devices conntected to CB Defense
actions.verbose: The results of this action can be paged using the start and limit parameters. For example, to return the first 10 results, set start to 1 and limit to 10. To return the next 10 results, set start to 11 and keep limit at 10.

start.description: Number of first result to return

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

actions.description: Change the policy of a device conntected to CB Defense

policy_id.description: ID of policy to assign to device

actions.description: List polcies that exist on CB Defense
Create a new policy on CB Defense
actions.verbose: The json_fields parameter can be used to configure other fields in the created policy. This parameter takes a JSON dictionary with the format of the policy field seen here.

json_fields.description: Other configuration fields in JSON format

example_values: This is going to be deleted very soon

actions.description: Delete a policy on CB Defense
Add a rule to a policy on CB Defense
Delete a rule from a policy on CB Defense
List processes that match supplied filter criteria
actions.verbose: Due to a limitation in the API, the only options for the search_span parameter are one day, one week, or two weeks. The results of this action can be paged using the start and limit parameters. For example, to return the first 10 results, set start to 1 and limit to 10. To return the next 10 results, set start to 11 and keep limit at 10.

search_span.description: Number of days back to search

start.description: Number of first result to return

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

actions.description: List events that match supplied filter criteria
actions.verbose:
Use the description parameter to search for a substring in the description of an event. The description of an event will include general information about the event such as fields like destination URL and commandline entries.

The parameter ip, host_name, hash, application, and owner apply only to the device the event came from. Thus, for example, the ip paramters cannot be used to search for a destination IP. To search for a certain destination IP, or other fields, use the description parameter instead.

Due to a limitation in the API, the only options for the search_span parameter are one day, one week, or two weeks.

description.description: Search for a substring in the event description

search_span.description: Number of days back to search

actions.verbose: This action retrieves the current list of notifiactions from CB Defense. Once a notification is retrieved, it cannot be retrieved again.
